Meeting on economic issues

http://t.co/JnYQeziZ http://t.co/JtEKRyXi
Overall, last year was a very successful year for the country's economy.
Gross domestic product increased by 2.2 percent. This is, in fact, a very high indicator for developed countries, especially for the crisis years.
Our non-oil sector increased by 9.7 percent last year. Our non-oil industry has grown by about 8 percent.
Agriculture has grown by about 6 percent. The macroeconomic situation is very positive.
Inflation is only 1.1 percent, which is the lowest level in recent years. Population's cash income increased by 13.8 percent.
The difference between inflation and money income is more than 10 percent. This is one of the highest rates in the world.
According to official statistics, last year the investments were more than $ 22 billion.
13 billion of this is a bit more than $ 10 billion, and about $ 9 billion is foreign investment. This is a very positive indicator.
The $ 9 billion foreign investment also shows that our country is a very reliable partner and attractive country for foreign investors.
According to the Davos Economic Forum, our economy is in the 46th place due to its competitiveness and is the first in the CIS.
The budget of this year is also at a record level, about 20 billion manats will be spent.
At present, our total foreign exchange reserves are at $ 46 billion.
Our currency reserves account for about 70 percent of the gross domestic product.

Wapo watu wanaojaribu kuigawa nchi kwa misingi ya dini, rangi na makabila. Kazi yangu ya kwanza ni kuilinda nchi dhidi ya watu hawa.
Kazi yangu nyingine kubwa pamoja na serikali nzima ni kubuni sera zenye lengo la kupunguza na kuondoa umasikini katika Taifa letu.
Idadi ya watu inaongezeka kwa kasi na tuna watu wengi masikini Tanzania. Namna ya kuboresha ustawi wao katika maisha ni jukumu langu kubwa.
Tunaimarisha ustawi kwa namna mbili. 1. Kuboresha huduma kwa wananchi kwenye elimu, afya na miundombinu. Hii ni changamoto tunayofanikiwa.
2. Kuongeza ustawi wa wananchi kwa kuongeza kipato. (Ajira katika sekta ya umma na binafsi). Haya ndiyo tunayapigania kila kukicha.
Nchi Ufaransa niliulizwa kuhusu kushindwa kwa Jeshi la Mali kuilinda nchi yao dhidi ya waasi waliotishia kuuteka mji mkuu wa nchi yao.
Jibu langu ni kwamba kazi ya Jeshi la nchi yoyote ni kulinda usalama wa mipaka ya nchi na pia tishio lolote la uasi wa ndani & si kutawala.
